name: Watcher's Steps
description:
A game by @snapman_i_am for Ludum Dare 41. A combination of a Walking Sim (firewatch, tacoma, ethan carter) and a Walking Simulator (as popularized by Bennet Foddy's QWOP, GIRP, CLOP, and Getting Over It). Collect the journal pages to uncover a dark and foreboding story. And maybe try not to fall.

EDIT: Adding this because nobody seems to understand the in-game sign: Look at your feet to not trip

UPDATE: v1.1 fixed a bug with jump strength being framerate dependent.
